title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: the self-hosted LLM runner that lets you pull, run and chat with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. on macOS, Linux & Windows with one command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama HTTP API—works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and push models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package that plugs Ollama into LangChain as a local LLM provider for chains, agents and RAG.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with multi-model chats, PDF uploads, RAG, user auth and dark mode.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Rust—browse, chat and manage models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot (simonw/ollama-copilot)
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot proxy that uses a local Ollama model instead of OpenAI.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team: use any Ollama model as a Generator or Embedder in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot (gabacode/ollama-rag-chatbot)
summary: Turn any PDF into a local chatbot: FastAPI backend, Streamlit frontend, Ollama for generation & embeddings.

title: ollama-codellama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that pipes autocomplete and inline chat through CodeLlama served by Ollama.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-rust (pepperoni21/ollama-rust)
summary: Community Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-csharp (awaescher/ollama-csharp)
summary: .NET library and CLI for Ollama with Blazor demo app.

title: ollama-camunda-bridge
summary: Official Camunda 8 connector that invokes Ollama models inside BPMN processes for human-like decisions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official repo with Docker Compose stacks for CPU & GPU (nvidia) setups plus Open WebUI addon.

title: ollama-models-hub (mneedham/ollama-models-hub)
summary: Curated list of custom Modelfiles (Llava, SQLCoder, StarCoder, etc.) ready to import into Ollama.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Official Discord bot bringing local LLM chat to your server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-elixir (zachallaun/ollama-elixir)
summary: Elixir client for Ollama with GenServer behaviour for streaming completions in Phoenix apps.

title: ollama-rag-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a RAG-powered side panel querying your vault via Ollama embeddings.
